mapper.insert: INSERT INTO title (content, instruction, status, total_number, department_id) VALUE (#{content}, #{instruction}, #{status}, #{totalNumber}, #{department.id})
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, instruction, status, create_time FROM title

SELECT count(id) FROM title
WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT id, content, instruction, create_time FROM title WHERE status = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE title SET has_select = has_select + 1 WHERE id = #{titleId} AND total_number - has_select > 0
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, content, instruction, create_time, has_select, total_number, d.id department_id, d.name department_name FROM title t, department d WHERE t.has_select < t.total_number AND t.status = 1 AND d.id = t.department_id ORDER BY department_id
